item.title: good lesson before holidays
item.description: 09:57 Monday 23 April 2018 JST Good lesson at IL this morning, though only two students attended. I praised the student who came 35 minutes late to thank her for attending even though it was apparently a challenge to join. Next week’s lesson is canceled due to a week of holidays, so on May 7th, I will invite them to talk about their holidays in English.

item.title: plan for tomorrow
item.description: 21:28 Sunday 03 September 2017 JST 15-20 minutes: new student intro self, students ask questions, new student ask questions. (I write Time, Name, Job, Etc outline on left side and then old topics on board while questions are in progress) 15-20 minutes: students prepare to do a quick presentation (one line summary at least) on any topic 15-20 minutes: students give their presentation, starting with new student’s helper 15-20 minutes: move on to next topic
